# Welcome {.unnumbered .unlisted}

Welcome to the 12^th^ edition of **EUI Library Research Data Guide**. This guide is intended as a one-stop-shop guide for all things research-data-related that may be useful to the EUI Academic Community.

This guide is curated bythe [EUI Library](https://www.eui.eu/en/services/library) as part of the portfolio of resources provided by the [Research Data Services](https://www.eui.eu/research/library/researchdataservices)

## Availability of this guide {.unnumbered .unlisted}

The **EUI Library Research Data Guide** is  released as an open project on GitHub so that the broader community can adapt and reuse it as needed. This guide is available in three different formats:

- **Web version** (this website): []()

- **PDF version** (for offline consultation): []()

- **GitHub repository** (for contributing and reuse): [https://github.com/EUI-Library/research-data-guide](https://github.com/EUI-Library/research-data-guide)

For any question, comment or feedback please reach out to [**Simone Sacchi**](https://www.eui.eu/people?id=simone-sacchi) or create an issue on the Research Data Guide [GitHub repository](https://github.com/EUI-Library/research-data-guide/issues)

::: {.callout-note}
The Research Data Guide is, and will always be, a free and open resource. This guide will be udated on a regular basis, but it also receives an official annual release number (we are now at the 12^th^ edition) that consolidates all the updates and revisions issued throughout the year.
:::
